data.comment: Today's referee, James Linington, has blown to start the match.
Goal! A Kieffer Moore header gives Cardiff a 0-1 lead in Nottingham.
In the minute 3, Marlon Pack instrumental with a fine assist.
Lyle Taylor is on a sub for Joe Lolley for Nottingham.
Goal! Cardiff extend their lead to 0-2 through Kieffer Moore.
In the minute 40, Great play from Sean Morrison to set up the goal.
James Linington blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Nottingham.
In the minute 73, The home team have replaced Lewis Grabban with Miguel Angel Guerrero. This is the second substitution made today by Sabri Lamouchi.
Will Vaulks is replacing Sheyi Ojo for the away team.
Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at City Ground with Lee Tomlin replacing Junior Hoilett.
In the minute 80, Sabri Lamouchi (Nottingham) is making a third substitution, with Alexander Mighten replacing Carl Jenkinson.
Joe Bennett, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Souleymane Bamba is the substitute for Cardiff.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
